column2: chartx<-ggplot(davg, aes(x=AVgTemp, y=decade, group=decade))+geom_point(aes(color=AVgTemp),pch=15, size=5)+scale_colour_gradient(low="steelblue",high="firebrick1")     +scale_y_continuous(trans = "reverse", labels=davg$decade, breaks = davg$decade)+theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "black"), panel.grid.minor = element_line(colour = "black", linetype = 3), panel.grid.major = element_line(colour = "black", linetype = 3))+theme(axis.text.x = element_blank(), axis.ticks = element_blank(),axis.title = element_blank(), legend.position = "top", legend.direction = "horizontal", legend.title = element_text(colour = "black"), legend.background = element_rect(fill = "black"), legend.text = element_text(colour = "white"))+ggtitle("Annual Average Temperature In Decades")+geom_hline(yintercept = c(1895,1905,1915,1925,1935,1945,1955,1965,1975,1985,1995,2005,2015), linetype=3, colour="gray60")+theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill="black"), axis.text.y = element_text(colour="white"),plot.title = element_text(colour = "white", hjust = 0.5))
